lessons_learned: Leveraging existing infrastructure (90% reuse) significantly reduces implementation complexity
Agent-specific context optimization is more effective than generic context delivery
Multi-factor relevance scoring provides optimal balance of quality and efficiency
Performance requirements are achievable with proper caching and optimization strategies
Real-time system understanding delivery requires integration with system analysis engines
Information overload prevention is critical for agent effectiveness and requires intelligent filtering
